Com_Welcome:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_01>Welcome!<sp:5:0:0> You've found yourself at
<clr:0000>South Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>.
Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>I'm thinking I'd like to hang up a painting
of the Unity Bellâ€”you know, the one over
in <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> of here.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The story goes that if two people ring that
bell together, then their love will last
forever. All sorts of couples go visit it.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>My daughters have been asking for a
<clr:0000>picture of the Unity Bell <clr:ffff>to liven up
the place.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>I'd go paint a picture myself, but work
keeps me too busy.
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>Thanks to you, Link, I finished that
painting. My daughters sure are happy!<sp:0:4:0>I've even heard them say they'd like to
ring it with their own special someone.<sp:5:1:0>
I sure hope they find the same joy I did.
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> did you bring me a picture of the
<clr:0000>Unity Bell<clr:ffff>?!
DoNotWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:SurpriseM_00>Whoa there, <sp:5:0:0>sir, please stop!<sp:5:0:0> That belongs
to the stable. <sp:5:0:0>You can't remove it!

The shape of that <clr:0000>ring garland<clr:ffff> is
supposed to bring good fortune. <sp:5:0:0>Stables
keep them around as lucky charms.
They're made at a place called <clr:0000>Kakariko
Village<clr:ffff> in the hills far to the southwest.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Now, if you like it so much, <sp:5:0:0>you can go
get one for yourself.
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>If you're that fixated on our garland,
why not go get your own?!

You'll find them for sale in a place
called <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>. Just head to the
mountain range southwest of here.
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00>If I had a picture of it in front of me to use
as reference, I'm sure I could paint up
something real nice.
DoNotWakka_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Excuse me, sir! That's the stable's 
good-luck charm, so kindly leave it alone!<sp:0:4:0>If you like it, I'm sure you can find one
for yourself.<sp:0:4:0>They're made in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>, a town
in the hills a ways southwest of here.
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have a <clr:0000>picture of the Unity Bell<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0>,
<sp:5:0:0>I'd sure appreciate a look!
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Ah...it's almost as if I can hear the bell's
happy ring. I hear lots of couples have
held their wedding ceremonies there.
If you ever capture a different <clr:0000>picture
of the Unity Bell<clr:ffff>, I'm happy to make a
new painting.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>All you need to do is show me the picture
so I can use it as reference!
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>This sure brings back the memories...<sp:5:1:0>
You see,<sp:5:0:0> I did ring it once.

My wife and I rang it together, in fact.
And here we are, still happy together,
all thanks to that bell.
Goodbye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I almost forgot! Have you stopped by the
stable to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>Rumor has it that the <clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff> has
moved to that neck of the woods.<sp:0:4:0>I've heard that he's very powerful.
He can even resurrect a horse!<sp:0:4:0>Isn't that amazing? I bet anyone who
appreciates horses would be happy
to have him around.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>*sigh* I wish he'd settled a little closer to
OUR stable.
Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>It's said that if two people ring the
Tarrey Town Unity Bell together,
they'll be granted eternal love.
It would make my daughters very happy
if I hung up a pretty <clr:0000>painting of the
Unity Bell<clr:ffff> on the wall here.
9007: It's fine the way it is.
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_00>Each time I look at the Unity Bell,
<sp:5:0:0>I remember the time I rang it with
my wife.
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>So,<sp:5:0:0> is there something you'd like to do
with the <clr:0000>picture of the Unity Bell<clr:ffff>?
Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>And now, in honor of your first visit with
us here at <clr:0000>South Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>...
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>In honor of both your first visit to
<clr:0000>South Akkala Stable <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>registering a
horse<clr:ffff> with us...
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I asked my family what sort of picture we
should put up,<sp:5:0:0> and we've finally decided.

Have you seen the "Unity Bell" in
<clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff> over in the east?

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>The story goes that if two people ring it
together, their love will last forever.<sp:5:0:0>
All sorts of couples pay it a visit.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway, I think it would be nice to paint a
<clr:0000>picture of the Unity Bell<sp:5:0:0> <clr:ffff>and hang it here
at the stable.
All four of my daughters think it would
look perfect on the wall too!

<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>But...I really need to go see it if I'm going
to paint it accurately.<sp:5:0:0> And, well, work is
far too busy for me to get away.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Of course...if I had a <clr:0000>picture <clr:ffff>of the
bell in front of me,<sp:5:0:0> I could just use
that as reference.
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Since this is not only your first visit to
<clr:0000>South Akkala Stable <clr:ffff>but you've also
chosen to <clr:0000>sleep here<clr:ffff>...
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Oho,<sp:5:0:0> you have a picture of the
<clr:0000>Unity Bell<clr:ffff>?
